title.raw: 《魯周公世家》 House of Lu Zhougong

sentences.zh: 周公旦者，周武王弟也。

translations.literal: Zhou Gong Dan, Zhou Wu Wang's younger brother.
translations.idiomatic: The Duke of Zhou Dan was King Wu's younger brother.

sentences.zh: 自文王在時，旦為子孝，篤仁，異於群子。

translations.literal: From Wen Wang time, Dan as son filial, sincere benevolent, different from group sons.
translations.idiomatic: Even when King Wen was still alive, Dan was a filial son and sincerely benevolent, setting him apart from his brothers.

sentences.zh: 及武王即位，旦常輔翼武王，用事居多。

translations.literal: To Wu Wang ascended throne, Dan constantly assisted Wu Wang, handled affairs most.
translations.idiomatic: After King Wu ascended the throne, Dan constantly assisted him and handled most affairs.

sentences.zh: 武王九年，東伐至盟津，周公輔行。

translations.literal: Wu Wang ninth year, east attacked to Meng Jin, Zhou Gong assisted went.
translations.idiomatic: In King Wu's ninth year, they attacked east to Meng Ford; the Duke of Zhou assisted in the campaign.

sentences.zh: 十一年，伐紂，至牧野，周公佐武王，作牧誓。

translations.literal: Eleventh year, attacked Zhou, to Mu Ye, Zhou Gong assisted Wu Wang, made Mu Shi oath.
translations.idiomatic: In the eleventh year, they attacked King Zhou, reaching the Mu wilderness. The Duke of Zhou assisted King Wu and composed the Mu Oath.

sentences.zh: 破殷，入商宮。

translations.idiomatic: They broke Yin and entered the Shang palace.

sentences.zh: 已殺紂，周公把大鉞，召公把小鉞，以夾武王，釁社，告紂之罪于天，及殷民。

translations.literal: Already killed Zhou, Zhou Gong held great axe, Zhao Gong held small axe, flanked Wu Wang, sacrificed altar, informed Zhou's crimes to heaven, and Yin people.
translations.idiomatic: After King Zhou was killed, the Duke of Zhou held the great axe and the Duke of Zhao held the small axe, flanking King Wu. They sacrificed at the altar, proclaiming King Zhou's crimes to heaven and the Yin people.

sentences.zh: 釋箕子之囚。
封紂子武庚祿父，使管叔、蔡叔傅之，以續殷祀。

translations.literal: Enfeoffed Zhou son Wu Geng Lu Fu, made Guan Shu, Cai Shu teach him, to continue Yin sacrifices.
translations.idiomatic: They enfeoffed King Zhou's son Wu Geng Lufu, appointing Guan Shu and Cai Shu as his tutors, to continue the Yin sacrifices.

sentences.zh: 遍封功臣同姓戚者。

translations.literal: Universally enfeoffed meritorious ministers same surname relatives.
translations.idiomatic: They universally enfeoffed meritorious ministers and same-surname relatives.

sentences.zh: 封周公旦於少昊之虛曲阜，是為魯公。

translations.literal: Enfeoffed Zhou Gong Dan at Shao Hao's old capital Qu Fu, this was Lu Gong.
translations.idiomatic: They enfeoffed the Duke of Zhou Dan at Shaohao's old capital of Qufu; this made him Duke of Lu.

sentences.zh: 周公不就封，留佐武王。

translations.literal: Zhou Gong not accept enfeoffment, stayed assisted Wu Wang.
translations.idiomatic: The Duke of Zhou did not take up his enfeoffment but stayed to assist King Wu.

translations.literal: Zhou Gong Dan, Zhou Wu Wang's younger brother. From Wen Wang time, Dan as son filial, sincere benevolent, different from group sons. To Wu Wang ascended throne, Dan constantly assisted Wu Wang, handled affairs most. Wu Wang ninth year, east attacked to Meng Jin, Zhou Gong assisted went. Eleventh year, attacked Zhou, to Mu Ye, Zhou Gong assisted Wu Wang, made Mu Shi oath. Broke Yin, entered Shang palace. Already killed Zhou, Zhou Gong held great axe, Zhao Gong held small axe, flanked Wu Wang, sacrificed altar, informed Zhou's crimes to heaven, and Yin people. Released Ji Zi's prisoner. Enfeoffed Zhou son Wu Geng Lu Fu, made Guan Shu, Cai Shu teach him, to continue Yin sacrifices. Universally enfeoffed meritorious ministers same surname relatives. Enfeoffed Zhou Gong Dan at Shao Hao's old capital Qu Fu, this was Lu Gong. Zhou Gong not accept enfeoffment, stayed assisted Wu Wang.

sentences.zh: 武王克殷二年，天下未集，武王有疾，不豫，群臣懼，太公、召公乃繆卜。

translations.literal: Wu Wang conquered Yin second year, world not yet gathered, Wu Wang had illness, not well, ministers feared, Tai Gong, Zhao Gong then divined.
translations.idiomatic: In the second year after King Wu conquered Yin, the world was not yet pacified. King Wu fell ill and was not well. The ministers were fearful, so Taigong and Zhaogong performed divination.

sentences.zh: 周公曰：「未可以戚我先王。」

translations.literal: Zhou Gong said: 'Not can grieve our previous kings.'
translations.idiomatic: The Duke of Zhou said: 'We cannot grieve our previous kings.'

sentences.zh: 周公於是乃自以為質，設三壇，周公北面立，戴璧秉圭，告于太王、王季、文王。

translations.literal: Zhou Gong then self became pledge, set up three altars, Zhou Gong north faced stood, wore jade disc held jade tablet, informed Tai Wang, Wang Ji, Wen Wang.
translations.idiomatic: The Duke of Zhou then offered himself as pledge. He set up three altars, faced north and stood, wearing a jade disc and holding a jade tablet, praying to King Tai, King Ji, and King Wen.

sentences.zh: 史策祝曰：「惟爾元孫王發，勤勞阻疾。

translations.literal: Shi ce blessed said: 'Only your first grandson Wang Fa, diligent labored ill.
translations.idiomatic: The scribe blessed and said: 'Only your first grandson King Fa has labored diligently and fallen ill.

sentences.zh: 若爾三王是有負子之責於天，以旦代王發之身。

translations.literal: If you three kings have bear son's responsibility to heaven, with Dan replace Wang Fa's body.
translations.idiomatic: If you three kings bear the responsibility for your son to heaven, let Dan replace King Fa's body.'

sentences.zh: 旦巧能，多材多藝，能事鬼神。

translations.literal: Dan skilled able, many talents many arts, able serve ghosts spirits.
translations.idiomatic: Dan is skilled and able, with many talents and arts, able to serve the ghosts and spirits.

sentences.zh: 乃王發不如旦多材多藝，不能事鬼神。

translations.literal: Wang Fa not like Dan many talents many arts, cannot serve ghosts spirits.
translations.idiomatic: But King Fa is not like Dan with many talents and arts; he cannot serve the ghosts and spirits.

sentences.zh: 乃命于帝庭，敷佑四方，用能定汝子孫于下地，四方之民罔不敬畏。

translations.literal: Then commanded at emperor court, spread help four directions, used able settle your descendants on lower land, four directions people none not revere fear.
translations.idiomatic: Therefore command came from the emperor's court, spreading aid to the four directions, enabling settlement of your descendants on the lower lands. The people of the four directions none do not revere and fear.

sentences.zh: 無墜天之降葆命，我先王亦永有所依歸。

translations.literal: No fall heaven's descended protect mandate, our previous kings also forever have place rely.
translations.idiomatic: Do not let fall heaven's descended protective mandate; our previous kings also forever have a place to rely on.'

sentences.zh: 今我其即命於元龜，爾之許我，我以其璧與圭歸，以俟爾命。

translations.literal: Now I will receive command from great turtle, you permit me, I with its jade disc jade tablet return, await your command.
translations.idiomatic: Now I will receive the command from the great turtle. If you permit me, I will return with its jade disc and tablet to await your command.

sentences.zh: 爾不許我，我乃屏璧與圭。」

translations.literal: You not permit me, I then reject jade disc jade tablet.'
translations.idiomatic: If you do not permit me, I will reject the jade disc and tablet.'

sentences.zh: 周公已令史策告太王、王季、文王，欲代武王發，於是乃即三王而卜。

translations.literal: Zhou Gong already ordered shi ce inform Tai Wang, Wang Ji, Wen Wang, wished replace Wu Wang Fa, then approached three kings divined.

sentences.zh: 卜人皆曰吉，發書視之，信吉。

translations.literal: Diviners all said auspicious, opened book viewed it, indeed auspicious.

sentences.zh: 周公喜，開籥，乃見書遇吉。

translations.literal: Zhou Gong pleased, opened bamboo slips, then saw book met auspicious.

sentences.zh: 周公入賀武王曰：「王其無害。

translations.literal: Zhou Gong entered congratulated Wu Wang said: 'Wang will no harm.

sentences.zh: 旦新受命三王，維長終是圖。

translations.literal: Dan newly received command three kings, only long forever plan this.

sentences.zh: 茲道能念予一人。」

translations.literal: This way able think of me one person.'

sentences.zh: 周公藏其策金縢匱中，誡守者勿敢言。

translations.literal: Zhou Gong hid its ce gold tied box within, warned guards not dare speak.

sentences.zh: 其後武王既崩，成王少，在彊葆之中。

translations.literal: After Wu Wang already collapsed, Cheng Wang young, in strong protection within.

sentences.zh: 周公恐天下聞武王崩而畔，周公乃踐阼代成王攝行政當國。

translations.literal: Zhou Gong feared world heard Wu Wang collapse rebel, Zhou Gong then ascended throne replaced Cheng Wang administered government held country.

sentences.zh: 管叔及其群弟流言於國曰：「周公將不利於成王。」

translations.literal: Guan Shu and his group brothers spread rumors in country said: 'Zhou Gong will harm Cheng Wang.'

sentences.zh: 周公乃告太公望、召公奭曰：「我之所以弗辟而攝行政者，恐天下畔周，無以告我先王太王、王季、文王。

translations.literal: Zhou Gong then told Tai Gong Wang, Zhao Gong Shi said: 'I so not avoid administered government, feared world rebel Zhou, no way inform our previous kings Tai Wang, Wang Ji, Wen Wang.

sentences.zh: 三王之憂勞天下久矣，於今而后成。

translations.literal: Three kings' worry labor world long, to now afterward complete.

sentences.zh: 武王蚤終，成王少，將以成周，我所以為之若此。」

translations.literal: Wu Wang early ended, Cheng Wang young, will complete Zhou, I so do it like this.'

sentences.zh: 於是卒相成王，而使其子伯禽代就封於魯。

translations.literal: Then finally assisted Cheng Wang, made his son Bo Qin replace accept enfeoffment at Lu.

sentences.zh: 周公戒伯禽曰：「我文王之子，武王之弟，成王之叔父，我於天下亦不賤矣。

translations.literal: Zhou Gong warned Bo Qin said: 'I Wen Wang's son, Wu Wang's younger brother, Cheng Wang's uncle father, I at world also not lowly.

sentences.zh: 然我一沐三捉發，一飯三吐哺，起以待士，猶恐失天下之賢人。

translations.literal: But I one bathe three grasp hair, one eat three spit food, rise await scholars, still feared lose world's worthy people.

sentences.zh: 子之魯，慎無以國驕人。」

translations.literal: You to Lu, careful not with country arrogant people.'

After Wu Wang already collapsed, Cheng Wang young, in strong protection within. Zhou Gong feared world heard Wu Wang collapse rebel, Zhou Gong then ascended throne replaced Cheng Wang administered government held country. Guan Shu and his group brothers spread rumors in country said: 'Zhou Gong will harm Cheng Wang.' Zhou Gong then told Tai Gong Wang, Zhao Gong Shi said: 'I so not avoid administered government, feared world rebel Zhou, no way inform our previous kings Tai Wang, Wang Ji, Wen Wang. Three kings' worry labor world long, to now afterward complete. Wu Wang early ended, Cheng Wang young, will complete Zhou, I so do it like this.' Then finally assisted Cheng Wang, made his son Bo Qin replace accept enfeoffment at Lu. Zhou Gong warned Bo Qin said: 'I Wen Wang's son, Wu Wang's younger brother, Cheng Wang's uncle father, I at world also not lowly. But I one bathe three grasp hair, one eat three spit food, rise await scholars, still feared lose world's worthy people. You to Lu, careful not with country arrogant people.'

sentences.zh: 管、蔡、武庚等果率淮夷而反。

translations.literal: Guan, Cai, Wu Geng etc. indeed led Huai Yi rebel.

sentences.zh: 周公乃奉成王命，興師東伐，作大誥。

translations.literal: Zhou Gong then received Cheng Wang command, raised troops east attacked, made great announcement.

sentences.zh: 遂誅管叔，殺武庚，放蔡叔。

translations.literal: Then executed Guan Shu, killed Wu Geng, banished Cai Shu.

sentences.zh: 收殷餘民，以封康叔於衛，封微子於宋，以奉殷祀。

translations.literal: Collected Yin remaining people, enfeoffed Kang Shu at Wei, enfeoffed Wei Zi at Song, to serve Yin sacrifices.

sentences.zh: 寧淮夷東土，二年而畢定。

translations.literal: Pacified Huai Yi eastern lands, two years then completely settled.

sentences.zh: 諸侯咸服宗周。

translations.literal: Feudal lords all submitted revered Zhou.

Guan, Cai, Wu Geng etc. indeed led Huai Yi rebel. Zhou Gong then received Cheng Wang command, raised troops east attacked, made great announcement. Then executed Guan Shu, killed Wu Geng, banished Cai Shu. Collected Yin remaining people, enfeoffed Kang Shu at Wei, enfeoffed Wei Zi at Song, to serve Yin sacrifices. Pacified Huai Yi eastern lands, two years then completely settled. Feudal lords all submitted revered Zhou.

Eastern lands with gathered, Zhou Gong returned reported Cheng Wang, then made poem gave Wang, named it Chi Xiao. Wang also not dared instruct Zhou Gong.

Mother leisure said: 'Be person parents, occupation to long lasting, descendants arrogant extravagant forget it, with lose their family, be person son can not careful? Formerly in Yin Wang Zhong Zong, strict respectful feared heaven mandate, self measured governed people, shocked feared not dare idle peaceful, so Zhong Zong enjoyed country seventy-five years. Its in Gao Zong, long labored outside, for with small people, made his ascended throne, then had bright dark, three years not speak, speak then clear, not dare idle peaceful, quiet calmed Yin country, to small great no resentment, so Gao Zong enjoyed country fifty-five years. Its in Zu Jia, not righteous only king, long as small person outside, knew small people's dependence, able protect extend small people, not insult few, so Zu Jia enjoyed country thirty-three years.' Many scholars said: 'From Tang to Di Yi, none not followed sacrifices bright virtue, none not matched heaven. In now later successor Wang Zhou, wantonly lewd his leisure, not consider heaven and people's following. Its people all can execute.' (Zhou many scholars) 'Wen Wang day middle declined not leisure eat, enjoyed country fifty years.' Made this to warn Cheng Wang.

sentences.zh: 成王在豐，天下已安，周之官政未次序，於是周公作周官，官別其宜，作立政，以便百姓。

translations.literal: Literal: 成王在豐，天下已安，周之官政未次序，於是周公作周官，官別其宜，作立政，以便百姓。
translations.idiomatic: Idiomatic: 成王在豐，天下已安，周之官政未次序，於是周公作周官，官別其宜，作立政，以便百姓。

sentences.zh: 百姓說。

translations.literal: Cheng Wang in Feng, world already peaceful, Zhou's official government not in order, then Zhou Gong made Zhou officers, officers distinguished their suitable, made establish government, convenient people. People pleased.

sentences.zh: 周公在豐，病，將沒，曰：「必葬我成周，以明吾不敢離成王。」

translations.literal: Literal: 周公在豐，病，將沒，曰：「必葬我成周，以明吾不敢離成王。」
translations.idiomatic: Idiomatic: 周公在豐，病，將沒，曰：「必葬我成周，以明吾不敢離成王。」

sentences.zh: 周公既卒，成王亦讓，葬周公於畢，從文王，以明予小子不敢臣周公也。

translations.literal: Literal: 周公既卒，成王亦讓，葬周公於畢，從文王，以明予小子不敢臣周公也。
translations.idiomatic: Idiomatic: 周公既卒，成王亦讓，葬周公於畢，從文王，以明予小子不敢臣周公也。

translations.literal: Zhou Gong in Feng, ill, about die, said: 'Must bury me Cheng Zhou, to show I not dare leave Cheng Wang.' Zhou Gong already died, Cheng Wang also declined, buried Zhou Gong at Bi, followed Wen Wang, to show my little son not dare minister Zhou Gong.

sentences.zh: 周公卒後，秋未穫，暴風雷［雨］，禾盡偃，大木盡拔。

translations.literal: Literal: 周公卒後，秋未穫，暴風雷［雨］，禾盡偃，大木盡拔。
translations.idiomatic: Idiomatic: 周公卒後，秋未穫，暴風雷［雨］，禾盡偃，大木盡拔。

sentences.zh: 周國大恐。
成王與大夫朝服以開金縢書，王乃得周公所自以為功代武王之說。

translations.literal: Literal: 成王與大夫朝服以開金縢書，王乃得周公所自以為功代武王之說。
translations.idiomatic: Idiomatic: 成王與大夫朝服以開金縢書，王乃得周公所自以為功代武王之說。

sentences.zh: 二公及王乃問史百執事，史百執事曰：「信有，昔周公命我勿敢言。」

translations.literal: Literal: 二公及王乃問史百執事，史百執事曰：「信有，昔周公命我勿敢言。」
translations.idiomatic: Idiomatic: 二公及王乃問史百執事，史百執事曰：「信有，昔周公命我勿敢言。」

sentences.zh: 成王執書以泣，曰：「自今後其無繆卜乎！

translations.literal: Literal: 成王執書以泣，曰：「自今後其無繆卜乎！
translations.idiomatic: Idiomatic: 成王執書以泣，曰：「自今後其無繆卜乎！

sentences.zh: 昔周公勤勞王家，惟予幼人弗及知。

translations.literal: Literal: 昔周公勤勞王家，惟予幼人弗及知。
translations.idiomatic: Idiomatic: 昔周公勤勞王家，惟予幼人弗及知。

sentences.zh: 今天動威以彰周公之德，惟朕小子其迎，我國家禮亦宜之。」

translations.literal: Literal: 今天動威以彰周公之德，惟朕小子其迎，我國家禮亦宜之。」
translations.idiomatic: Idiomatic: 今天動威以彰周公之德，惟朕小子其迎，我國家禮亦宜之。」

sentences.zh: 王出郊，天乃雨，反風，禾盡起。

translations.literal: Literal: 王出郊，天乃雨，反風，禾盡起。
translations.idiomatic: Idiomatic: 王出郊，天乃雨，反風，禾盡起。

sentences.zh: 二公命國人，凡大木所偃，盡起而筑之。

translations.literal: Literal: 二公命國人，凡大木所偃，盡起而筑之。
translations.idiomatic: Idiomatic: 二公命國人，凡大木所偃，盡起而筑之。

sentences.zh: 歲則大孰。
於是成王乃命魯得郊祭文王。

translations.literal: Literal: 於是成王乃命魯得郊祭文王。
translations.idiomatic: Idiomatic: 於是成王乃命魯得郊祭文王。

sentences.zh: 魯有天子禮樂者，以褒周公之德也。

translations.literal: Literal: 魯有天子禮樂者，以褒周公之德也。
translations.idiomatic: Idiomatic: 魯有天子禮樂者，以褒周公之德也。

translations.literal: Zhou Gong died after, autumn not harvested, violent wind thunder rain, grain all flattened, great trees all uprooted. Zhou country greatly feared. Cheng Wang with grand masters court robes opened gold tied book, Wang then obtained Zhou Gong self considered merit replace Wu Wang's words. Two gongs and Wang then asked shi hundred officials, shi hundred officials said: 'Indeed have, formerly Zhou Gong commanded me not dare speak.' Cheng Wang held book cried, said: 'From now after will no wrong divination? Formerly Zhou Gong diligent labored Wang family, only I young person not reached know. Now heaven moved awe to manifest Zhou Gong's virtue, only my little son welcome, our state rites also suitable it.' Wang went suburbs, heaven then rained, reversed wind, grain all rose. Two gongs ordered country people, all great trees flattened places, all rose built them. Year then great harvest. Then Cheng Wang ordered Lu obtain suburban sacrifice Wen Wang. Lu had heavenly son rites music, to praise Zhou Gong's virtue.

sentences.zh: 周公卒，子伯禽固已前受封，是為魯公。

translations.literal: Literal: 周公卒，子伯禽固已前受封，是為魯公。
translations.idiomatic: Idiomatic: 周公卒，子伯禽固已前受封，是為魯公。

sentences.zh: 魯公伯禽之初受封之魯，三年而後報政周公。

translations.literal: Literal: 魯公伯禽之初受封之魯，三年而後報政周公。
translations.idiomatic: Idiomatic: 魯公伯禽之初受封之魯，三年而後報政周公。

sentences.zh: 周公曰：「何遲也？」
伯禽曰：「變其俗，革其禮，喪三年然後除之，故遲。」

translations.literal: Literal: 伯禽曰：「變其俗，革其禮，喪三年然後除之，故遲。」
translations.idiomatic: Idiomatic: 伯禽曰：「變其俗，革其禮，喪三年然後除之，故遲。」

sentences.zh: 太公亦封於齊，五月而報政周公。

translations.literal: Literal: 太公亦封於齊，五月而報政周公。
translations.idiomatic: Idiomatic: 太公亦封於齊，五月而報政周公。

sentences.zh: 周公曰：「何疾也？」
曰：「吾簡其君臣禮，從其俗為也。」

translations.literal: Literal: 曰：「吾簡其君臣禮，從其俗為也。」
translations.idiomatic: Idiomatic: 曰：「吾簡其君臣禮，從其俗為也。」

sentences.zh: 及後聞伯禽報政遲，乃嘆曰：「嗚呼，魯後世其北面事齊矣！

translations.literal: Literal: 及後聞伯禽報政遲，乃嘆曰：「嗚呼，魯後世其北面事齊矣！
translations.idiomatic: Idiomatic: 及後聞伯禽報政遲，乃嘆曰：「嗚呼，魯後世其北面事齊矣！

sentences.zh: 夫政不簡不易，民不有近；

translations.literal: Literal: 夫政不簡不易，民不有近；
translations.idiomatic: Idiomatic: 夫政不簡不易，民不有近；

sentences.zh: 平易近民，民必歸之。」

translations.literal: Literal: 平易近民，民必歸之。」
translations.idiomatic: Idiomatic: 平易近民，民必歸之。」

translations.literal: Zhou Gong died, son Bo Qin already previously received enfeoffment, this was Lu Gong. Lu Gong Bo Qin's initially received enfeoffment Lu, three years then reported government Zhou Gong. Zhou Gong said: 'Why late?' Bo Qin said: 'Change their customs, reform their rites, mourn three years then remove, so late.' Tai Gong also enfeoffed at Qi, five months reported government Zhou Gong. Zhou Gong said: 'Why fast?' Said: 'I simplified their lord minister rites, followed their customs did it.' To after heard Bo Qin reported government late, then sighed said: 'Alas, Lu later generations will north face serve Qi! Government not simple not easy, people not have close; Peaceful easy close people, people must return it.'

sentences.zh: 伯禽即位之後，有管、蔡等反也，淮夷、徐戎亦并興反。

translations.literal: Literal: 伯禽即位之後，有管、蔡等反也，淮夷、徐戎亦并興反。
translations.idiomatic: Idiomatic: 伯禽即位之後，有管、蔡等反也，淮夷、徐戎亦并興反。

sentences.zh: 於是伯禽率師伐之於肸，作肸誓，曰：「陳爾甲胄，無敢不善。

translations.literal: Literal: 於是伯禽率師伐之於肸，作肸誓，曰：「陳爾甲胄，無敢不善。
translations.idiomatic: Idiomatic: 於是伯禽率師伐之於肸，作肸誓，曰：「陳爾甲胄，無敢不善。

sentences.zh: 無敢傷牿。
馬牛其風，臣妾逋逃，勿敢越逐，敬復之。
無敢寇攘，踰墻垣。
魯人三郊三隧，峙爾芻茭、糗糧、楨榦，無敢不逮。
我甲戌筑而征徐戎，無敢不及，有大刑。」
作此肸誓，遂平徐戎，定魯。

translations.literal: Bo Qin ascended position after, had Guan, Cai etc. rebel, Huai Yi, Xu Rong also together rose rebel. Then Bo Qin led troops attacked them at Xi, made Xi oath, said: 'Array your armor weapons, none dare not good. None dare injure pregnant. Horse oxen their wind, minister concubine fled, not dare cross pursue, respectfully return them. None dare plunder steal, cross wall fences. Lu people three suburbs three tunnels, prepare your fodder grain, dry provisions, stakes beams, none dare not reach. I Jia Xu built attacked Xu Rong, none dare not reach, have great punishment.' Made this Xi oath, then pacified Xu Rong, settled Lu.

sentences.zh: 魯公伯禽卒，子考公酋立。
考公四年卒，立弟熙，是謂煬公。
煬公筑茅闕門。
六年卒，子幽公宰立。
幽公十四年。
幽公弟沸殺幽公而自立，是為魏公。
魏公五十年卒，子厲公擢立。
厲公三十七年卒，魯人立其弟具，是為獻公。
獻公三十二年卒，子真公濞立。

translations.literal: Lu Gong Bo Qin died, son Kao Gong Qiu established. Kao Gong four years died, established younger brother Xi, this called Yang Gong. Yang Gong built Mao Que gate. Six years died, son You Gong Zai established. You Gong fourteen years. You Gong younger brother Fei killed You Gong self established, this was Wei Gong. Wei Gong fifty years died, son Li Gong Zhuo established. Li Gong thirty-seven years died, Lu people established his younger brother Ju, this was Xian Gong. Xian Gong thirty-two years died, son Zhen Gong Bi established.

sentences.zh: 真公十四年，周厲王無道，出奔彘，共和行政。
二十九年，周宣王即位。

translations.literal: Zhen Gong fourteen years, Zhou Li Wang no way, went fleeing Zhu, republican administered government. Twenty-nine years, Zhou Xuan Wang ascended throne.

sentences.zh: 三十年，真公卒，弟敖立，是為武公。

translations.literal: Thirty years, Zhen Gong died, younger brother Ao established, this was Wu Gong.

sentences.zh: 武公九年春，武公與長子括，少子戲，西朝周宣王。
宣王愛戲，欲立戲為魯太子。
周之樊仲山父諫宣王曰：「廢長立少，不順；
不順，必犯王命；
犯王命，必誅之：故出令不可不順也。
令之不行，政之不立；
行而不順，民將棄上。
夫下事上，少事長，所以為順。
今天子建諸侯，立其少，是教民逆也。
若魯從之，諸侯效之，王命將有所壅；
若弗從而誅之，是自誅王命也。
誅之亦失，不誅亦失，王其圖之。」
宣王弗聽，卒立戲為魯太子。
夏，武公歸而卒，戲立，是為懿公。

translations.literal: Wu Gong nine years spring, Wu Gong with eldest son Kuo, youngest son Xi, west court Zhou Xuan Wang. Xuan Wang loved Xi, wished establish Xi as Lu crown prince. Zhou's Fan Zhong Shan Fu advised Xuan Wang said: 'Abolish eldest establish youngest, not follow; not follow, must violate Wang command; violate Wang command, must execute: so issue command cannot not follow. Command not walk, government not establish; walk not follow, people will abandon above. Below serve above, young serve old, so for follow. Now heavenly son establishes feudal lords, establishes their young, is teach people rebel. If Lu follows it, feudal lords imitate it, Wang command will have blocked; if not follow execute it, is self execute Wang command. Execute also loss, not execute also loss, Wang his plan it.' Xuan Wang not listen, finally established Xi as Lu crown prince. Summer, Wu Gong returned died, Xi established, this was Yi Gong.

sentences.zh: 懿公九年，懿公兄括之子伯御與魯人攻弒懿公，而立伯御為君。
伯御即位十一年，周宣王伐魯，殺其君伯御，而問魯公子能道順諸侯者，以為魯後。
樊穆仲曰：「魯懿公弟稱，肅恭明神，敬事耆老；
賦事行刑，必問於遺訓而咨於固實；
不干所問，不犯所（知）［咨］。」
宣王曰：「然，能訓治其民矣。」
乃立稱於夷宮，是為孝公。
自是後，諸侯多畔王命。

translations.literal: Yi Gong nine years, Yi Gong elder brother Kuo's son Bo Yu with Lu people attacked assassinated Yi Gong, established Bo Yu as lord. Bo Yu ascended position eleven years, Zhou Xuan Wang attacked Lu, killed its lord Bo Yu, inquired Lu gong zi able guide follow feudal lords, to make Lu successor. Fan Mu Zhong said: 'Lu Yi Gong younger brother Cheng, solemn respectful bright spirits, respectful served elders; assigned affairs executed punishments, must ask previous teachings consult old practices; not interfere asked, not violate consulted.' Xuan Wang said: 'Yes, able teach govern his people.' Then established Cheng at Yi Gong palace, this was Xiao Gong. From this after, feudal lords many rebelled Wang command.

sentences.zh: 孝公二十五年，諸侯畔周，犬戎殺幽王。
秦始列為諸侯。

translations.literal: Xiao Gong twenty-five years, feudal lords rebelled Zhou, Quan Rong killed You Wang. Qin began ranked as feudal lords.

sentences.zh: 二十七年，孝公卒，子弗湟立，是為惠公。

translations.literal: Twenty-seven years, Xiao Gong died, son Fu Nang established, this was Hui Gong.

sentences.zh: 惠公三十年，晉人弒其君昭侯。
四十五年，晉人又弒其君孝侯。

translations.literal: Hui Gong thirty years, Jin people assassinated their lord Zhao Hou. Forty-five years, Jin people again assassinated their lord Xiao Hou.

sentences.zh: 四十六年，惠公卒，長庶子息攝當國，行君事，是為隱公。
初，惠公適夫人無子，公賤妾聲子生子息。
息長，為娶於宋。
宋女至而好，惠公奪而自妻之。
生子允。
登宋女為夫人，以允為太子。
及惠公卒，為允少故，魯人共令息攝政，不言即位。

translations.literal: Forty-six years, Hui Gong died, long concubine son Xi acted held country, walked lord affairs, this was Yin Gong. Initially, Hui Gong proper wife no sons, duke lowly concubine Sheng Zi gave birth son Xi. Xi grown, married for him at Song. Song woman arrived good, Hui Gong took her self married. Gave birth son Yun. Promoted Song woman as wife, made Yun crown prince. To Hui Gong died, for Yun young reason, Lu people together ordered Xi act government, not speak ascended position.

sentences.zh: 隱公五年，觀漁於棠。
八年，與鄭易天子之太山之邑祊及許田，君子譏之。

translations.literal: Yin Gong five years, observed fishing at Tang. Eight years, with Zheng exchanged heavenly son's Tai Shan yi Bang and Xu field, gentlemen criticized it.

sentences.zh: 十一年冬，公子揮諂謂隱公曰：「百姓便君，君其遂立。
吾請為君殺子允，君以我為相。」
隱公曰：「有先君命。
吾為允少，故攝代。
今允長矣，吾方營菟裘之地而老焉，以授子允政。」
揮懼子允聞而反誅之，乃反譖隱公於子允曰：「隱公欲遂立，去子，子其圖之。
請為子殺隱公。」
子允許諾。
十一月，隱公祭鐘巫，齊于社圃，館于蒍氏。
揮使人殺隱公于蒍氏，而立子允為君，是為桓公。

translations.literal: Eleven years winter, Gong Zi Hui flattered told Yin Gong said: 'Hundred clans convenient lord, lord his then establish. I request for lord kill Zi Yun, lord make me chancellor.' Yin Gong said: 'Have previous lord command. I for Yun young, so act replace. Now Yun grown, I about manage rabbit fur place old there, give Zi Yun government.' Hui feared Zi Yun heard return execute him, then returned slandered Yin Gong to Zi Yun said: 'Yin Gong wishes then establish, leave you, you his plan it. Request for you kill Yin Gong.' Zi Yun permitted. Eleven month, Yin Gong sacrificed Zhong Wu, fasted at She Pu, lodged at Wei Shi. Hui made person kill Yin Gong at Wei Shi, established Zi Yun as lord, this was Huan Gong.

sentences.zh: 桓公元年，鄭以璧易天子之許田。
二年，以宋之賂鼎入於太廟，君子譏之。

translations.literal: Huan Gong first year, Zheng with jade exchanged heavenly son's Xu field. Second year, with Song's bribe tripod entered great temple, gentlemen criticized it.

sentences.zh: 三年，使揮迎婦于齊為夫人。
六年，夫人生子，與桓公同日，故名曰同。
同長，為太子。

translations.literal: Third year, made Hui welcome wife from Qi as wife. Six years, wife gave birth son, with Huan Gong same day, so named Tong. Tong grown, became crown prince.

sentences.zh: 十六年，會于曹，伐鄭，入厲公。

translations.literal: Sixteen years, assembled at Cao, attacked Zheng, entered Li Gong.

sentences.zh: 十八年春，公將有行，遂與夫人如齊。
申繻諫止，公不聽，遂如齊。
齊襄公通桓公夫人。
公怒夫人，夫人以告齊侯。
夏四月丙子，齊襄公饗公，公醉，使公子彭生抱魯桓公，因命彭生摺其脅，公死于車。
魯人告于齊曰：「寡君畏君之威，不敢寧居，來修好禮。
禮成而不反，無所歸咎，請得彭生除丑於諸侯。」
齊人殺彭生以說魯。
立太子同，是為莊公。
莊公母夫人因留齊，不敢歸魯。

translations.literal: Eighteen years spring, duke about have travel, then with wife went to Qi. Shen Xu advised stop, duke not listened, then went to Qi. Qi Xiang Gong communicated Huan Gong wife. Duke angered wife, wife informed Qi Hou. Summer fourth month Bing Zi, Qi Xiang Gong feasted duke, duke drunk, made Gong Zi Peng Sheng embrace Lu Huan Gong, because ordered Peng Sheng fold his ribs, duke died in carriage. Lu people informed Qi said: 'Our lord feared lord's awe, not dare peaceful reside, came repair good rites. Rites complete not return, nowhere return blame, please obtain Peng Sheng remove shame at feudal lords.' Zhuang Gong not listened, then imprisoned Guan Zhong gave Qi. Established crown prince Tong, this was Zhuang Gong. Zhuang Gong mother wife because stayed Qi, not dared return Lu.

sentences.zh: 莊公五年冬，伐衛，內衛惠公。

translations.literal: Zhuang Gong five years winter, attacked Wei, entered Wei Hui Gong.

sentences.zh: 八年，齊公子糾來奔。
九年，魯欲內子糾於齊，後桓公，桓公發兵擊魯，魯急，殺子糾。
召忽死。
齊告魯生致管仲。
魯人施伯曰：「齊欲得管仲，非殺之也，將用之，用之則為魯患。
不如殺，以其尸與之。」
莊公不聽，遂囚管仲與齊。
齊人相管仲。

translations.literal: Eight years, Qi gong zi Jiu came flee. Nine years, Lu wished enter Zi Jiu to Qi, after Huan Gong, Huan Gong sent troops attacked Lu, Lu urgent, killed Zi Jiu. Zhao Hu died. Qi informed Lu living deliver Guan Zhong. Lu person Shi Bo said: 'Qi wishes obtain Guan Zhong, not kill him, will use him, use him then become Lu trouble. Not like kill, give his corpse to them.' Zhuang Gong did not listen, then imprisoned Guan Zhong with Qi. Qi people made Guan Zhong chancellor.

sentences.zh: 十三年，魯莊公與曹沬會齊桓公於柯，曹沬劫齊桓公，求魯侵地，已盟而釋桓公。
桓公欲背約，管仲諫，卒歸魯侵地。
十五年，齊桓公始霸。
二十三年，莊公如齊觀社。

translations.literal: Thirteenth year, Lu Zhuang Gong with Cao Mei assembled Qi Huan Gong at Ke, Cao Mei kidnapped Qi Huan Gong, sought Lu invaded land, already allied released Huan Gong. Huan Gong wished break agreement, Guan Zhong advised, finally returned Lu invaded land. Fifteenth year, Qi Huan Gong began hegemon. Twenty-three years, Zhuang Gong went to Qi observed altar.

sentences.zh: 三十二年，初，莊公筑臺臨黨氏，見孟女，說而愛之，許立為夫人，割臂以盟。
孟女生子斑。
斑長，說梁氏女，往觀。
圉人犖自墻外與梁氏女戲。
斑怒，鞭犖。
莊公聞之，曰：「犖有力焉，遂殺之，是未可鞭而置也。」
斑未得殺。
會莊公有疾。
莊公有三弟，長曰慶父，次曰叔牙，次曰季友。
莊公取齊女為夫人曰哀姜。
哀姜無子。
哀姜娣曰叔姜，生子開。
莊公無適嗣，愛孟女，欲立其子斑。
莊公病，而問嗣於弟叔牙。
叔牙曰：「一繼一及，魯之常也。
慶父在，可為嗣，君何憂？」
莊公患叔牙欲立慶父，退而問季友。
季友曰：「請以死立斑也。」
莊公曰：「曩者叔牙欲立慶父，柰何？」
季友以莊公命命牙待於鍼巫氏，使鍼季劫飲叔牙以鴆，曰：「飲此則有後奉祀；
不然，死且無後。」
牙遂飲鴆而死，魯立其子為叔孫氏。
八月癸亥，莊公卒，季友竟立子斑為君，如莊公命。
侍喪，舍于黨氏。

translations.literal: Thirty-two years, initially, Zhuang Gong built tower overlooked Dang Shi, saw Meng woman, pleased loved her, permitted establish as wife, cut arm allied. Meng woman gave birth son Ban. Ban grown, pleased Liang Shi woman, went observe. Stable man Luan from wall outside with Liang Shi woman played. Ban angered, whipped Luan. Zhuang Gong heard it, said: 'Luan has strength, then killed him, is not can whip place.' Ban not obtained kill. Met Zhuang Gong had illness. Zhuang Gong had three younger brothers, eldest Qing Fu, second Shu Ya, second Ji You. Zhuang Gong took Qi woman as wife called Ai Jiang. Ai Jiang no sons. Ai Jiang younger sister called Shu Jiang, gave birth son Kai. Zhuang Gong no proper heir, loved Meng woman, wished establish her son Ban. Zhuang Gong ill, asked heir from younger brother Shu Ya. Shu Ya said: 'One continue one reach, Lu's constant. Qing Fu present, can be heir, lord what worry?' Zhuang Gong troubled Shu Ya wished establish Qing Fu, retreated asked Ji You. Ji You said: 'Request with death establish Ban.' Zhuang Gong said: 'Previously Shu Ya wished establish Qing Fu, how?' Ji You with Zhuang Gong command ordered Ya wait at Zhen Wu Shi, made Zhen Ji force drink Shu Ya with poison, said: 'Drink this then have descendants serve sacrifices; not so, die moreover no descendants.' Ya then drank poison died, Lu established his son as Shu Sun Shi. Eight month Gui Hai, Zhuang Gong died, Ji You finally established Zi Ban as lord, like Zhuang Gong command. Served mourning, resided at Dang Shi.

sentences.zh: 先時慶父與哀姜私通，欲立哀姜娣子開。
及莊公卒而季友立斑，十月己未，慶父使圉人犖殺魯公子斑於黨氏。
季友奔陳。
慶父竟立莊公子開，是為湣公。

translations.literal: Before Qing Fu with Ai Jiang privately communicated, wished establish Ai Jiang younger sister son Kai. To Zhuang Gong died Ji You established Ban, tenth month Ji Wei, Qing Fu made stable man Luan kill Lu gong zi Ban at Dang Shi. Ji You fled Chen. Qing Fu finally established Zhuang Gong son Kai, this was Min Gong.

sentences.zh: 湣公二年，慶父與哀姜通益甚。
哀姜與慶父謀殺湣公而立慶父。
慶父使卜齮襲殺湣公於武闈。
季友聞之，自陳與湣公弟申如邾，請魯求內之。
魯人欲誅慶父。
慶父恐，奔莒。
於是季友奉子申入，立之，是為釐公。
釐公亦莊公少子。
哀姜恐，奔邾。
季友以賂如莒求慶父，慶父歸，使人殺慶父，慶父請奔，弗聽，乃使大夫奚斯行哭而往。
慶父聞奚斯音，乃自殺。
齊桓公聞哀姜與慶父亂以危魯，及召之邾而殺之，以其尸歸，戮之魯。
魯釐公請而葬之。

translations.literal: Min Gong second year, Qing Fu with Ai Jiang communicated increasingly excessive. Ai Jiang with Qing Fu plotted kill Min Gong establish Qing Fu. Qing Fu made Bo Xi attack killed Min Gong at Wu Wei. Ji You heard it, from Chen with Min Gong younger brother Shen went to Zhu, requested Lu seek enter him. Lu people wished execute Qing Fu. Qing Fu feared, fled Ju. Then Ji You served Zi Shen entered, established him, this was Xi Gong. Xi Gong also Zhuang Gong youngest son. Ai Jiang feared, fled Zhu. Ji You with bribe went to Ju sought Qing Fu, Qing Fu returned, made person kill Qing Fu, Qing Fu requested flee, not listened, then made grand master Xi Si walk cry go. Qing Fu heard Xi Si sound, then self killed. Qi Huan Gong heard Ai Jiang with Qing Fu disorder endangered Lu, called her from Zhu killed her, with her corpse returned, displayed Lu. Lu Xi Gong requested buried her.

sentences.zh: 季友母陳女，故亡在陳，陳故佐送季友及子申。
季友之將生也，父魯桓公使人卜之，曰：「男也，其名曰『友』，閒于兩社，為公室輔。
季友亡，則魯不昌。」
及生，有文在掌曰「友」，遂以名之，號為成季。
其後為季氏，慶父後為孟氏也。

translations.literal: Ji You mother Chen woman, so fled in Chen, Chen therefore assisted sent Ji You and Zi Shen. Ji You about give birth, father Lu Huan Gong made person divine it, said: 'Male, his name 'You', between two altars, for gong chamber auxiliary. Ji You flee, then Lu not prosper.' To born, had writing on palm said 'You', then with name it, number Cheng Ji. His after became Ji Shi, Qing Fu after became Meng Shi.

sentences.zh: 釐公元年，以汶陽鄪封季友。
季友為相。

translations.literal: Xi Gong first year, with Wen Yang Meng enfeoffed Ji You. Ji You became chancellor.

sentences.zh: 九年，晉裏克殺其君奚齊、卓子。
齊桓公率釐公討晉亂，至高梁而還，立晉惠公。
十七年，齊桓公卒。
二十四年，晉文公即位。

translations.literal: Nine years, Jin Li Ke killed their lord Xi Qi, Zhuo Zi. Qi Huan Gong led Xi Gong punished Jin disorder, reached Gao Liang returned, established Jin Hui Gong. Seventeen years, Qi Huan Gong died. Twenty-four years, Jin Wen Gong ascended position.

sentences.zh: 三十三年，釐公卒，子興立，是為文公。

translations.literal: Thirty-three years, Xi Gong died, son Xing established, this was Wen Gong.

sentences.zh: 文公元年，楚太子商臣弒其父成王，代立。
三年，文公朝晉襄父。

translations.literal: Wen Gong first year, Chu crown prince Shang Chen assassinated his father Cheng Wang, replaced established. Third year, Wen Gong court Jin Xiang Fu.

sentences.zh: 十一年十月甲午，魯敗翟于咸，獲長翟喬如，富父終甥舂其喉，以戈殺之，埋其首於子駒之門，以命宣伯。

translations.literal: Eleven years tenth month Jia Wu, Lu defeated Di at Xian, obtained long Di Qiao Ru, Fu Fu Zhong Sheng thrust his throat, with spear killed him, buried his head at Zi Ju gate, to command Xuan Bo.

sentences.zh: 初，宋武公之世，鄋瞞伐宋，司徒皇父帥師御之，以敗翟于長丘，獲長翟緣斯。
晉之滅路，獲喬如弟棼如。
齊惠公二年，鄋瞞伐齊，齊王子城父獲其弟榮如，埋其首於北門。
衛人獲其季弟簡如。
鄋瞞由是遂亡。

translations.literal: Initially, Song Wu Gong time, Kuai Man attacked Song, Si Tu Huang Fu led troops resisted it, with defeated Di at Chang Qiu, obtained long Di Yuan Si. Jin's extinguished Lu, obtained Qiao Ru younger brother Fen Ru. Qi Hui Gong second year, Kuai Man attacked Qi, Qi Wang Zi Cheng Fu obtained his younger brother Rong Ru, buried his head at north gate. Wei people obtained his youngest younger brother Jian Ru. Kuai Man from this then perished.

sentences.zh: 十五年，季文子使於晉。

translations.literal: Fifteen years, Ji Wen Zi sent to Jin.

sentences.zh: 十八年二月，文公卒。
文公有二妃：長妃齊女為哀姜，生子惡及視；
次妃敬嬴，嬖愛，生子俀。
俀私事襄仲，襄仲欲立之，叔仲曰不可。
襄仲請齊惠公，惠公新立，欲親魯，許之。
冬十月，襄仲殺子惡及視而立俀，是為宣公。
哀姜歸齊，哭而過市，曰：「天乎！
襄仲為不道，殺適立庶！」
市人皆哭，魯人謂之「哀姜」。
魯由此公室卑，三桓彊。

translations.literal: Eighteen years second month, Wen Gong died. Wen Gong had two wives: eldest wife Qi woman called Ai Jiang, gave birth sons Wu and Shi; second wife Jing Ying, favored loved, gave birth son Chou. Chou privately served Xiang Zhong, Xiang Zhong wished establish him, Shu Zhong said cannot. Xiang Zhong requested Qi Hui Gong, Hui Gong newly established, wished close Lu, permitted it. Winter tenth month, Xiang Zhong killed Zi Wu and Shi established Chou, this was Xuan Gong. Ai Jiang returned Qi, cried passed market, said: 'Heaven! Xiang Zhong does not follow way, kills proper establishes secondary!' Market people all cried, Lu people called her 'Ai Jiang'. Lu from this gong chamber lowly, three Huan strong.

sentences.zh: 宣公俀十二年，楚莊王彊，圍鄭。
鄭伯降，復國之。

translations.literal: Xuan Gong Chou twelve years, Chu Zhuang Wang strong, surrounded Zheng. Zheng Bo surrendered, restored his state.

sentences.zh: 十八年，宣公卒，子成公黑肱立，是為成公。
季文子曰：「使我殺適立庶失大援者，襄仲。」
襄仲立宣公，公孫歸父有寵。
宣公欲去三桓，與晉謀伐三桓。
會宣公卒，季文子怨之，歸父奔齊。

translations.literal: Eighteen years, Xuan Gong died, son Cheng Gong Hei Gong established, this was Cheng Gong. Ji Wen Zi said: 'Made me kill proper establish secondary lose great support, Xiang Zhong.' Xiang Zhong established Xuan Gong, Gong Sun Gui Fu had favor. Xuan Gong wished remove three Huan, with Jin plotted attack three Huan. Met Xuan Gong died, Ji Wen Zi resented it, Gui Fu fled Qi.

sentences.zh: 成公二年春，齊伐取我隆。
夏，公與晉郤克敗齊頃公於砹齊復歸我侵地。
四年，成公如晉，晉景公不敬魯。
魯欲背晉合於楚，或諫，乃不。
十年，成公如晉。
晉景公卒，因留成公送葬，魯諱之。
十五年，始與吳王壽夢會鐘離。

translations.literal: Cheng Gong second year spring, Qi attacked took our Long. Summer, duke with Jin Xi Ke defeated Qi Qing Gong at Ai, Qi returned our invaded land. Fourth year, Cheng Gong went to Jin, Jin Jing Gong not respected Lu. Lu wished break Jin unite with Chu, someone advised, then not. Tenth year, Cheng Gong went to Jin. Jin Jing Gong died, because detained Cheng Gong send funeral, Lu avoided it. Fifteenth year, began with Wu Wang Shou Meng assembled Zhong Li.

sentences.zh: 十六年，宣伯告晉，欲誅季文子。
文子有義，晉人弗許。

translations.literal: Sixteenth year, Xuan Bo informed Jin, wished execute Ji Wen Zi. Wen Zi had righteousness, Jin people not permitted.

sentences.zh: 十八年，成公卒，子午立，是為襄公。
是時襄公三歲也。

translations.literal: Eighteenth year, Cheng Gong died, son Wu established, this was Xiang Gong. At this time Xiang Gong three years.

sentences.zh: 襄公元年，晉立悼公。
往年冬，晉欒書弒其君厲公。
四年，襄公朝晉。

translations.literal: Xiang Gong first year, Jin established Dao Gong. Previous year winter, Jin Luan Shu assassinated their lord Li Gong. Fourth year, Xiang Gong court Jin.

sentences.zh: 五年，季文子卒。
家無衣帛之妾，廄無食粟之馬，府無金玉，以相三君。
君子曰：「季文子廉忠矣。」

translations.literal: Fifth year, Ji Wen Zi died. Family no silk cloth concubines, stable no grain eating horses, office no gold jade, to assist three lords. Gentlemen said: 'Ji Wen Zi incorrupt loyal.'

sentences.zh: 九年，與晉伐鄭。
晉悼公冠襄公於衛，季武子從，相行禮。

translations.literal: Ninth year, with Jin attacked Zheng. Jin Dao Gong capped Xiang Gong at Wei, Ji Wu Zi followed, assisted performed rites.

sentences.zh: 十一年，三桓氏分為三軍。

translations.literal: Eleventh year, three Huan families divided into three armies.

sentences.zh: 十二年，朝晉。
十六年，晉平公即位。
二十一年，朝晉平公。

translations.literal: Twelfth year, court Jin. Sixteenth year, Jin Ping Gong ascended position. Twenty-first year, court Jin Ping Gong.

sentences.zh: 二十二年，孔丘生。
二十五年，齊崔杼弒其君莊公，立其弟景公。

translations.literal: Twenty-fifth year, Qi Cui Zhu assassinated their lord Zhuang Gong, established his younger brother Jing Gong.

sentences.zh: 二十九年，吳延陵季子使魯，問周樂，盡知其意，魯人敬焉。

translations.literal: Twenty-ninth year, Wu Yan Ling Ji Zi sent to Lu, asked Zhou music, completely knew its meaning, Lu people respected him.

sentences.zh: 三十一年六月，襄公卒。
其九月，太子卒。
魯人立齊歸之子裯為君，是為昭公。

translations.literal: Thirty-first year sixth month, Xiang Gong died. Its ninth month, crown prince died. Lu people established Qi returned son Chou as lord, this was Zhao Gong.

sentences.zh: 昭公年十九，猶有童心。
穆叔不欲立，曰：「太子死，有母弟可立，不即立長。
年鈞擇賢，義鈞則卜之。
今裯非適嗣，且又居喪意不在戚而有喜色，若果立，必為季氏憂。」
季武子弗聽，卒立之。
比及葬，三易衰。
君子曰：「是不終也。」

translations.literal: Zhao Gong year nineteen, still had child heart. Mu Shu not wished establish, said: 'Crown prince died, has mother younger brother can establish, not immediately establish eldest. Years equal choose worthy, righteousness equal then divine it. Now Chou not proper heir, moreover in mourning intention not in sorrow has happy color, if indeed establish, must be Ji Shi worry.' Ji Wu Zi not listened, finally established him. When reached burial, three changed mourning clothes. Gentlemen said: 'This not end.'

sentences.zh: 昭公三年，朝晉至河，晉平公謝還之，魯恥焉。
四年，楚靈王會諸侯於申，昭公稱病不往。
七年，季武子卒。
八年，楚靈王就章華臺，召昭公。
昭公往賀，賜昭公寶器；
已而悔，復詐取之。
十二年，朝晉至河，晉平公謝還之。
十三年，楚公子棄疾弒其君靈王，代立。
十五年，朝晉，晉留之葬晉昭公，魯恥之。
二十年，齊景公與晏子狩竟，因入魯問禮。
二十一年，朝晉至河，晉謝還之。

translations.literal: Zhao Gong third year, court Jin to Yellow River, Jin Ping Gong apologized returned him, Lu shamed it. Fourth year, Chu Ling Wang assembled feudal lords at Shen, Zhao Gong claimed illness not went. Seventh year, Ji Wu Zi died. Eighth year, Chu Ling Wang completed Zhang Hua Tai, summoned Zhao Gong. Zhao Gong went congratulated, granted Zhao Gong treasure vessels; afterward regretted, again cheated took them. Twelfth year, court Jin to Yellow River, Jin Ping Gong apologized returned him. Thirteenth year, Chu gong zi Qi Ji assassinated their lord Ling Wang, replaced established. Fifteenth year, court Jin, Jin detained him bury Jin Zhao Gong, Lu shamed it. Twentieth year, Qi Jing Gong with Yan Zi hunted border, because entered Lu asked rites. Twenty-first year, court Jin to Yellow River, Jin apologized returned him.

sentences.zh: 二十五年春，鸜鵒來巢。
師己曰：「文成之世童謠曰『鸜鵒來巢，公在乾侯。
鸜鵒入處，公在外野』。」

translations.literal: Twenty-fifth year spring, qu yu came nest. Shi Ji said: 'Wen Cheng time children's rhyme said 'qu yu come nest, duke at Qian Hou. qu yu enter residence, duke outside fields'.'

sentences.zh: 季氏與郈氏鬬雞，季氏芥雞羽，郈氏金距。
季平子怒而侵郈氏，郈昭伯亦怒平子。
臧昭伯之弟會偽讒臧氏，匿季氏，臧昭伯囚季氏人。
季平子怒，囚臧氏老。
臧、郈氏以難告昭公。
昭公九月戊戌伐季氏，遂入。
平子登臺請曰：「君以讒不察臣罪，誅之，請遷沂上。」
弗許。
請囚於鄪，弗許。
請以五乘亡，弗許。
子家駒曰：「君其許之。
政自季氏久矣，為徒者眾，眾將合謀。」
弗聽。
郈氏曰：「必殺之。」
叔孫氏之臣戾謂其眾曰：「無季氏與有，孰利？」
皆曰：「無季氏是無叔孫氏。」
戾曰：「然，救季氏！」
遂敗公師。
孟懿子聞叔孫氏勝，亦殺郈昭伯。
郈昭伯為公使，故孟氏得之。
三家共伐公，公遂奔。
己亥，公至于齊。
齊景公曰：「請致千社待君。」
子家曰：「棄周公之業而臣於齊，可乎？」
乃止。
子家曰：「齊景公無信，不如早之晉。」
弗從。
叔孫見公還，見平子，平子頓首。
初欲迎昭公，孟孫、季孫後悔，乃止。

translations.literal: Ji Shi with Hou Shi fought cocks, Ji Shi mustard chicken feathers, Hou Shi gold spurs. Ji Ping Zi angered invaded Hou Shi, Hou Zhao Bo also angered Ping Zi. Zang Zhao Bo's younger brother Hui falsely slandered Zang Shi, hid Ji Shi, Zang Zhao Bo imprisoned Ji Shi people. Ji Ping Zi angered, imprisoned Zang Shi elders. Zang, Hou Shi with difficulty informed Zhao Gong. Zhao Gong ninth month Wu Xu attacked Ji Shi, then entered. Ping Zi ascended tower requested said: 'Lord with slander not examine minister crime, execute him, request move Yi Shang.' Not permitted. Requested imprison at Meng, not permitted. Requested with five chariots flee, not permitted. Zi Jia Ju said: 'Lord his permit it. Government from Ji Shi long, followers numerous, multitudes will unite plot.' Not listened. Hou Shi said: 'Must kill him.' Shu Sun Shi's minister Li told his multitudes said: 'No Ji Shi with have, which beneficial?' All said: 'No Ji Shi is no Shu Sun Shi.' Li said: 'Yes, save Ji Shi!' Then defeated duke troops. Meng Yi Zi heard Shu Sun Shi won, also killed Hou Zhao Bo. Hou Zhao Bo for duke envoy, so Meng Shi obtained him. Three families together attacked duke, duke then fled. Ji Hai, duke arrived Qi. Qi Jing Gong said: 'Request present thousand altars await lord.' Zi Jia said: 'Abandon Zhou Gong's enterprise become minister to Qi, can?' Then stopped. Zi Jia said: 'Qi Jing Gong no trust, not like early to Jin.' Not followed. Shu Sun saw duke returned, saw Ping Zi, Ping Zi knocked head. Initially wished welcome Zhao Gong, Meng Sun, Ji Sun afterward regretted, then stopped.

sentences.zh: 二十六年春，齊伐魯，取鄆而居昭公焉。
夏，齊景公將內公，令無受魯賂。
申豐、汝賈許齊臣高龁、子將粟五千庾。
子將言於齊侯曰：「群臣不能事魯君，有異焉。
宋元公為魯如晉，求內之，道卒。
叔孫昭子求內其君，無病而死。
不知天棄魯乎？
抑魯君有罪于鬼神也？
願君且待。」
齊景公從之。

translations.literal: Twenty-sixth year spring, Qi attacked Lu, took Yun resided Zhao Gong there. Summer, Qi Jing Gong about enter duke, ordered not accept Lu bribes. Shen Feng, Ru Jia permitted Qi minister Gao Que, Zi Jiang grain five thousand dou. Zi Jiang spoke to Qi Hou said: 'Group ministers cannot serve Lu lord, have different. Song Yuan Gong for Lu went Jin, sought enter him, road died. Shu Sun Zhao Zi sought enter their lord, no illness died. Not know heaven abandon Lu? Or Lu lord has crime to ghosts spirits? Wish lord moreover wait.' Qi Jing Gong followed it.

sentences.zh: 二十八年，昭公如晉，求入。
季平子私於晉六卿，六卿受季氏賂，諫晉君，晉君乃止，居昭公乾侯。
二十九年，昭公如鄆。
齊景公使人賜昭公書，自謂「主君」。
昭公恥之，怒而去乾侯。
三十一年，晉欲內昭公，召季平子。
平子布衣跣行，因六卿謝罪。
六卿為言曰：「晉欲內昭公，眾不從。」
晉人止。
三十二年，昭公卒於乾侯。
魯人共立昭公弟宋為君，是為定公。

translations.literal: Twenty-eighth year, Zhao Gong went Jin, sought enter. Ji Ping Zi privately with Jin six ministers, six ministers received Ji Shi bribes, advised Jin lord, Jin lord then stopped, resided Zhao Gong Qian Hou. Twenty-ninth year, Zhao Gong went Yun. Qi Jing Gong made person granted Zhao Gong letter, self called 'main lord'. Zhao Gong shamed it, angered left Qian Hou. Thirty-first year, Jin wished enter Zhao Gong, summoned Ji Ping Zi. Ping Zi cloth clothes barefoot walked, through six ministers apologized crime. Six ministers for spoke said: 'Jin wishes enter Zhao Gong, multitudes not follow.' Jin people stopped. Thirty-second year, Zhao Gong died at Qian Hou. Lu people together established Zhao Gong younger brother Song as lord, this was Ding Gong.

sentences.zh: 定公立，趙簡子問史墨曰：「季氏亡乎？」
史墨對曰：「不亡。
季友有大功於魯，受鄪為上卿，至于文子、武子，世增其業。
魯文公卒，東門遂殺適立庶，魯君於是失國政。
政在季氏，於今四君矣。
民不知君，何以得國！
是以為君慎器與名，不可以假人。」

translations.literal: Ding Gong established, Zhao Jian Zi asked Shi Mo said: 'Ji Shi perish?' Shi Mo answered said: 'Not perish. Ji You had great merit at Lu, received Meng as upper minister, to Wen Zi, Wu Zi, generations increased their enterprise. Lu Wen Gong died, Dong Men Sui killed proper established secondary, Lu lord then lost country government. Government in Ji Shi, to now four lords. People not know lord, how obtain country! Therefore be lord careful vessels and names, cannot lend people.'

sentences.zh: 定公五年，季平子卒。
陽虎私怒，囚季桓子，與盟，乃捨之。
七年，齊伐我，取鄆，以為魯陽虎邑以從政。
八年，陽虎欲盡殺三桓適，而更立其所善庶子以代之；
載季桓子將殺之，桓子詐而得脫。
三桓共攻陽虎，陽虎居陽關。
九年，魯伐陽虎，陽虎奔齊，已而奔晉趙氏。

translations.literal: Ding Gong fifth year, Ji Ping Zi died. Yang Hu privately angered, imprisoned Ji Huan Zi, allied with him, then released him. Seventh year, Qi attacked us, took Yun, made Lu Yang Hu yi to follow government. Eighth year, Yang Hu wished completely kill three Huan proper sons, moreover establish his good secondary sons to replace them; loaded Ji Huan Zi about kill him, Huan Zi cheated obtained escape. Three Huan together attacked Yang Hu, Yang Hu resided Yang Guan. Ninth year, Lu attacked Yang Hu, Yang Hu fled Qi, afterward fled Jin Zhao Shi.

sentences.zh: 十年，定公與齊景公會於夾谷，孔子行相事。
齊欲襲魯君，孔子以禮歷階，誅齊淫樂，齊侯懼，乃止，歸魯侵地而謝過。
十二年，使仲由毀三桓城，收其甲兵。
孟氏不肯墮城，伐之，不克而止。
季桓子受齊女樂，孔子去。

translations.literal: Tenth year, Ding Gong with Qi Jing Gong assembled at Jia Gu, Kong Qiu walked chancellor affairs. Qi wished attack Lu lord, Kong Qiu with rites ascended steps, executed Qi lewd music, Qi Hou feared, then stopped, returned Lu invaded land apologized crime. Twelfth year, made Zhong You destroy three Huan cities, collected their armor weapons. Meng Shi not wished fall city, attacked him, not conquered then stopped. Ji Huan Zi received Qi woman music, Kong Qiu left.

sentences.zh: 十五年，定公卒，子將立，是為哀公。

translations.literal: Fifteenth year, Ding Gong died, son Jiang established, this was Ai Gong.

sentences.zh: 哀公五年，齊景公卒。
六年，齊田乞弒其君孺子。

translations.literal: Ai Gong fifth year, Qi Jing Gong died. Sixth year, Qi Tian Qi assassinated their lord Ru Zi.

sentences.zh: 七年，吳王夫差彊，伐齊，至繒，徵百牢於魯。
季康子使子貢說吳王及太宰嚭，以禮詘之。
吳王曰：「我文身，不足責禮。」
乃止。

translations.literal: Seventh year, Wu Wang Fu Cha strong, attacked Qi, to Zeng, demanded hundred tribute offerings from Lu. Ji Kang Zi made Zi Gong persuade Wu Wang and chief steward Pi, with rites bent them. Wu Wang said: 'I tattooed body, not worth demand rites.' Then stopped.

sentences.zh: 吳為鄒伐魯，至城下，盟而去。
齊伐我，取三邑。
十年，伐齊南邊。

translations.literal: Wu for Zou attacked Lu, to city walls, allied left. Qi attacked us, took three yi. Tenth year, attacked Qi south border.

sentences.zh: 齊伐魯。
季氏用冉有有功，思孔子，孔子自衛歸魯。
齊田常弒其君簡公於俆州。
孔子請伐之，哀公不聽。

translations.literal: Qi attacked Lu. Ji Shi used Ran You had merit, thought Kong Qiu, Kong Qiu from Wei returned Lu. Qi Tian Chang assassinated their lord Jian Gong at Xu Zhou. Kong Qiu requested attack him, Ai Gong not listened.

sentences.zh: 十五年，使子服景伯、子貢為介，適齊，齊歸我侵地。
田常初相，欲親諸侯。

translations.literal: Fifteenth year, made Zi Fu Jing Bo, Zi Gong as intermediaries, went Qi, Qi returned our invaded land. Tian Chang initially chancellor, wished close feudal lords.

sentences.zh: 十六年，孔子卒。
二十二年，越王句踐滅吳王夫差。

translations.literal: Twenty-second year, Yue Wang Gou Jian extinguished Wu Wang Fu Cha.

sentences.zh: 二十七年春，季康子卒。
夏，哀公患三桓，將欲因諸侯以劫之，三桓亦患公作難，故君臣多閒。
公游于陵阪，遇孟武伯於街，曰：「請問余及死乎？」
對曰：「不知也。」
公欲以越伐三桓。
八月，哀公如陘氏。
三桓攻公，公奔于衛，去如鄒，遂如越。
國人迎哀公復歸，卒于有山氏。
子寧立，是為悼公。

translations.literal: Twenty-seventh year spring, Ji Kang Zi died. Summer, Ai Gong troubled three Huan, about wished take advantage feudal lords to coerce them, three Huan also troubled duke make difficulty, so lord minister many gaps. Duke toured at Ling Ban, met Meng Wu Bo at street, said: 'Please ask I reach death?' Answered said: 'Not know.' Duke wished with Yue attack three Huan. Eighth month, Ai Gong went Xi Shi. Three Huan attacked duke, duke fled to Wei, left went Zou, then went Yue. Country people welcomed Ai Gong returned, died at You Shan Shi. Son Ning established, this was Dao Gong.

sentences.zh: 悼公之時，三桓勝，魯如小侯，卑於三桓之家。

translations.literal: Dao Gong time, three Huan won, Lu like small marquis, lowly to three Huan families.

sentences.zh: 十三年，三晉滅智伯，分其地有之。

translations.literal: Thirteenth year, three Jin extinguished Zhi Bo, divided his land had it.

sentences.zh: 三十七年，悼公卒，子嘉立，是為元公。
元公二十一年卒，子顯立，是為穆公。
穆公三十三年卒，子奮立，是為共公。
共公二十二年卒，子屯立，是為康公。
康公九年卒，子匽立，是為景公。
景公二十九年卒，子叔立，是為平公。
是時六國皆稱王。

translations.literal: Thirty-seventh year, Dao Gong died, son Jia established, this was Yuan Gong. Yuan Gong twenty-first year died, son Xian established, this was Mu Gong. Mu Gong thirty-third year died, son Fen established, this was Gong Gong. Gong Gong twenty-second year died, son Tun established, this was Kang Gong. Kang Gong ninth year died, son Pi established, this was Jing Gong. Jing Gong twenty-ninth year died, son Shu established, this was Ping Gong. At this time six countries all called king.

sentences.zh: 平公十二年，秦惠王卒。
二十（二）年，平公卒，子賈立，是為文公。
文公（七）［元］年，楚懷王死于秦。
二十三年，文公卒，子讎立，是為頃公。

translations.literal: Ping Gong twelfth year, Qin Hui Wang died. Twenty year, Ping Gong died, son Jia established, this was Wen Gong. Wen Gong first year, Chu Huai Wang died at Qin. Twenty-third year, Wen Gong died, son Qiu established, this was Qing Gong.

sentences.zh: 頃公二年，秦拔楚之郢，楚頃王東徙于陳。
十九年，楚伐我，取徐州。
二十四年，楚考烈王伐滅魯。
頃公亡，遷於下邑，為家人，魯絕祀。
頃公卒于柯。

translations.literal: Qing Gong second year, Qin captured Chu's Ying, Chu Qing Wang east moved to Chen. Nineteenth year, Chu attacked us, took Xu Zhou. To their bow yield rites then followed, but actions what its contrary! Qing Gong fled, moved to lower yi, became commoner, Lu cut off sacrifices. Qing Gong died at Ke.

sentences.zh: 魯起周公至頃公，凡三十四世。

translations.literal: Lu from Zhou Gong to Qing Gong, altogether thirty-four generations.

sentences.zh: 太史公曰：余聞孔子稱曰「甚矣魯道之衰也！
洙泗之閒龂龂如也」。
觀慶父及叔牙閔公之際，何其亂也？
隱桓之事；
襄仲殺適立庶；
三家北面為臣，親攻昭公，昭公以奔。
至其揖讓之禮則從矣，而行事何其戾也？

translations.literal: Grand Historian said: I heard Kong Qiu say 'extreme Lu way's decline! Zhu Si between quarrel quarrel like'. Observe Qing Fu and Shu Ya Min Gong time, what its chaos? Yin Huan affairs; Xiang Zhong killed proper established secondary; three families north face became ministers, personally attacked Zhao Gong, Zhao Gong with fled. As for their bowing and yielding rituals, they followed them, but their actions—how perverse were they?
